description: Irregular triangle read by rows, representing a family of sequences L(n), for n=1, 2, 3, ... The sequence L(n) (i.e., the n-th row) is the ordinance of vectors of the n-dimensional Boolean cube (hypercube) {0,1}^n in accordance with their (Hamming) weights, where the lexicographic order is chosen as a second criterion for an ordinance the vectors of equal weights.
